control.description: Hidden Button to pass through navigation when recently added is disabled

control.visible: Container(9000).HasFocus(1) | Container(9000).HasFocus(2) | Container(9000).HasFocus(3) | Container(9000).HasFocus(4) | Container(9000).HasFocus(5) | Container(9000).HasFocus(6) | Container(9000).HasFocus(10) | Container(9000).HasFocus(11) | Container(9000).HasFocus(12) | Container(9000).HasFocus(13) | Container(9000).HasFocus(17) | [Skin.HasSetting(MainMenuVerticalSlideOut) + System.IdleTime(4) + !ControlGroup(9001).HasFocus()]
